entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:05 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
